The Poll portlet is the application for users to vote any ideas, or activities.

{docbook}
<para>
<citetitle>
<emphasis role="bold">
Package
</emphasis>
</citetitle>
</para>
{docbook}
This portlet is packaged in the _poll.war_ file.


{docbook}
<para xml:id="KSref.PollPortlet.PollPortletxml">
<citetitle>
<emphasis role="bold">
Portlet.xml
</emphasis>
</citetitle>
</para>
{docbook}
* See the _portlet.xml_ file in the project following this path: _poll/WEB-INF/portlet.xml_.

{code:xml}
<portlet-preferences>
  <preference>
    <name>pollIdShow</name>
    <value></value> <!-- PollId -->
    <read-only>false</read-only>
  </preference>
</portlet-preferences>
{code}
 
{docbook}
<para xml:id="KSref.PollPortlet.PollPortletPreferences">
<citetitle>
<emphasis role="bold">
Portlet Preferences
</emphasis>
</citetitle>
</para>

|| Preference name || Possible value || Default value || Description ||
| *pollIdShow* | {{string}} | {{empty}} | The Id of poll which is displayed in the Polls portlet. |
